jd: From: Kishore V, Vy Systems kishore.v@vysystems.com Reply to: kishore.v@vysystems.com Hi all,Hope you all doing well,We have an opening for below C2C requirements,*Kindly mention consultant current Location, work authorization and LinkedIn ID in mail*Role: Business Analyst with Benchling (Exp 10+)Location: Thousand Oaks, CA (Day 1 onsite)Top Skills:1. We are ok even if someone had been a end user of benchling.*Kishore - Talent Acquisition – USAEmail: kishore.v@vysystems.comVy Systems Inc
